name: Adarsh Gyanarjan Vidyalaya Samiti
briefDescription: The mission of our organization is to improve the life and well-beingof children and disabled in Hill Area, through education and improvedcommunity programs. We believe that we have the capacity to carry out this initiativebecause we have a strong history of success in child and youthservices, as well as health and wellness services. Our Society wasestablished in the year of 1991 and served more than 25 years andlikely to provide better service in future.
